exampleList.example: Example project for Freedom KL25Z board Uses C++ classes to create a basic 'Arduino' style hardware interface.
Example project for Freedom K20D50M board Uses C++ classes to create a basic 'Arduino' style hardware interface.
Example project for Freedom K64F board Uses C++ classes to create a basic 'Arduino' style hardware interface.
Example project for Freedom KL25Z board Includes example clock initialisation and port operations.

Example project for Freedom KL25Z board Includes example clock initialisation, port, PIT, LPTMR, RTC, PTM(PWM and OC), ADC operations and I2C (accelerometer). Includes example code demonstrating use of printf() with on-chip UART.
Example project for Freedom KL25Z board As for Freedom KL25Z Demonstration but with some experiments with CPP for comparison

Example project for Freedom K20D50M board Includes example clock initialisation, port, PIT, LPTMR, RTC, FTM(PWM and OC), ADC operations and I2C (accelerometer). Includes example code demonstrating use of printf() with on-chip UART.

Example project for Freedom K20D50M board Includes driver for colour LCD (Spark Fun LCD-09363 or ElecFreaks SHD-CLS). Uses Real Time Clock (RTC) for rand() function. Written using CPP classes (surprisingly efficient).
Example project for Freedom K20D50M board Includes CMSIS-RTOS examples

Example project for Freedom K20D50M board modified with K22FN12M Includes example clock initialisation, port, PIT, LPTMR, RTC, FTM(PWM and OC), ADC operations and I2C (accelerometer). Includes example code demonstrating use of printf() with on-chip UART.

Example project for Freedom K64F board Includes example clock initialisation, port, PIT, LPTMR, RTC, FTM(PWM and OC), ADC operations and I2C (accelerometer). Includes example code demonstrating use of printf() with on-chip UART.
Example project for Tower MCF51JF128 board Includes example port operations.

Example project for Tower MCF51JF128 board Includes example clock initialisation, port, PIT, LPTMR, MTIM, PTM(PWM and OC) and ADC operations. Includes example code demonstrating use of printf() with on-chip UART.
Example project for Generic MCF52233 device Includes example port operations.
Example project for STM32F103 (OLIMEXINO-STM32 Board) Includes STM32 Standard Peripheral Library (SPL) and CMSIS-RTOS
Example project using USBDM API to read data from the Flash memory of a target device using a USBDM interface.
Project to create the USBDM programming interface firmware targeted for MK20DX128M5 devices. This is suitable for FRDM-xxxx boards or stand-alone K20 hardware.
